thread.title: Kristi
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Kristi

author: Kristi
title: Kristi
text: I actually happened upon American Frames after a negative buying experience from another company. I could not be happier! Helpful people and a high-quality, and easy-to-assemble frame. Helpful videos on the site and this is important for customers who may be unfamiliar with selecting a frame for original art (as in my situation). Plan to purchase from American Frame again!
